roleset.name: move very fast
roleset.note: HURTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hurtle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2. (from hurtle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with direction
example.text: But with the impending passage of these new programs, Mr. Bush will surely be sending many people hurtling back into the regulatory thicket that he had helped cut back.
example.arg: into the regulatory thicket that he had helped cut back

example.name: with path
example.text: John's car hurtled down the highway.
